messages.intro: Enter time in 1/4 hour increments. If you do not see an issue you, enter it in the prompt at the end.
messages.hoursIncrements: Must be a in quarter hour increments (.25, .5, .75)
messages.hoursTooMany: You work too much!  Keep it under 16!
messages.mixedStatuses: This time card has mixed statuses - _WORKLOG_ = _STATUS_

issueGroups.name: Proj - Tasks
issueGroups.query: project != LE-Internal AND ((assignee was 'user.userid' and issueKey in IssueHistory()) or (updated >= -1w AND 'Last Updater' = 'user.userid') or (worklogComment ~ 'user.userid' and worklogDate >= '_TIMECARDSTART_' and worklogDate < '_TIMECARDEND_')) AND ('Project - Subproject' is empty OR 'Project - Subproject' not in ('10705 - LandsEnd.com Support', '10345 - Administration', '10558 - Run the Business')) ORDER BY Project, 'Project - Subproject', issueKey

issueGroups.name: Proj - General
issueGroups.query: project = LE-Internal AND ('Project - Subproject' is empty OR 'Project - Subproject' not in ('10705 - LandsEnd.com Support', '10345 - Administration', '10558 - Run the Business')) ORDER BY Project, 'Project - Subproject', issueKey

issueGroups.name: Support
issueGroups.query: ((assignee was 'user.userid' and issueKey in IssueHistory()) or (updated >= -2w AND 'Last Updater' = 'user.userid') or (worklogDate > startOfYear() and worklogComment ~ 'user.userid')) AND (Type = 'Problem' OR 'Project - Subproject' = '10705 - LandsEnd.com Support') OR (project = LE-Internal AND 'Project - Subproject' = '10705 - LandsEnd.com Support') ORDER BY Project, 'Project - Subproject', issueKey

issueGroups.name: Run The Business
issueGroups.query: (((assignee was 'user.userid' and issueKey in IssueHistory()) or (updated >= -2w AND 'Last Updater' = 'user.userid') or (worklogDate > -4w and worklogComment ~ 'user.userid')) AND 'Project - Subproject' = '10558 - Run the Business') OR (project = LE-Internal AND 'Project - Subproject' = '10558 - Run the Business') ORDER BY Project, 'Project - Subproject', issueKey

issueGroups.name: Administration
issueGroups.query: project = LE-Internal AND 'Project - Subproject' = '10345 - Administration' ORDER BY Project, 'Project - Subproject', issueKey

issueGroups.name: Don't see an issue you need? Enter it here: _JIRAPROJECTKEY_-_GOIMAGE_

messages.intro: Enter time in 1/4 hour increments. Do not see an issue you need? Find it and view it and it will show up.
messages.hoursIncrements: Must be a in quarter hour increments (.25, .5, .75)
messages.hoursTooMany: You work too much!  Keep it under 16!
messages.mixedStatuses: This time card has mixed statuses - _WORKLOG_ = _STATUS_

issueGroups.name: Projects
issueGroups.query: (((assignee was 'user.userid' and issueKey in IssueHistory()) or (updated >= -1w AND 'Last Updater' = 'user.userid') or (worklogDate > -4w and worklogComment ~ 'user.userid')) AND (('Project - Subproject' is empty OR 'Project - Subproject' not in ('10705 - LandsEnd.com Support', '10345 - Administration', '10558 - Run the Business')) AND (project != LE-Internal))) OR (project = LE-Internal AND 'Project - Subproject' not in ('10705 - LandsEnd.com Support', '10345 - Administration', '10558 - Run the Business')) ORDER BY 'Project - Subproject'

issueGroups.name: Support
issueGroups.query: (((assignee was 'user.userid' and issueKey in IssueHistory()) or (updated >= -2w AND 'Last Updater' = 'user.userid') or (worklogDate > startOfYear() and worklogComment ~ 'user.userid')) AND 'Project - Subproject' = '10705 - LandsEnd.com Support') OR (project = LE-Internal AND 'Project - Subproject' = '10705 - LandsEnd.com Support')

issueGroups.name: Run The Business
issueGroups.query: project = LE-Internal AND 'Project - Subproject' = '10558 - Run the Business'
